tasks.name: Phase 1: Backend Development
tasks.description: Set up the backend environment and develop the scraping logic for liquidation listings.
tasks.completion_criteria: Backend is set up, scraping logic implemented, and API endpoints for fetching listings and item details are available.

tasks.name: Phase 2: Integration with eBay API
tasks.description: Integrate eBay API and implement functionality to fetch and store selling history data.
tasks.completion_criteria: eBay API is integrated, and data is being fetched and stored successfully.

tasks.name: Phase 3: Value Analysis
tasks.description: Develop algorithms to analyze and assess the value of items and lots based on eBay data.
tasks.completion_criteria: Algorithms for value analysis are developed and tested successfully.

tasks.name: Phase 4: Testing and Documentation
tasks.description: Write tests for all functionalities and document the API using Swagger/OpenAPI.
tasks.completion_criteria: All tests are written, and comprehensive API documentation is complete.
